ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, we have the same thing on Sol Ro, with Paradigm and The Twelve Moons. Both are fairly exclusive allowing only a small number of guests on hunts and not
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, we have the same thing on Sol Ro, with Paradigm and The Twelve Moons.
Both are fairly exclusive allowing only a small number of guests on hunts
and not really abiding by others who might try to call a dragon or plane
hunt. The bashing they receive is amazing though, and on a whole,
undeserved; especially The Twelve Moons, which is a predominately German
guild. They get a few too many anti-German comments for my taste (focusing
on their nationality not the way they play the game).

Those in the guilds attribute it to jealousy but more realistically, I think
its frustration. The successful large guilds are highly organized, and
where it might take a rag-tag group (or smaller guild) 4 hours to prepare
for and kill something, these guys can walk in and do it in an hour (or
less). I don't think its because they are better players at all, but
because they have a few people who possess leadership, motivation and
organization. And its frustration, not jealousy that causes bitter comments
when a group of 3 guilds has been clearing Fear for 12 hours only to have a
larger/more experienced/uber/whatever guild waltz into a plane and steal the
kill.

Anyway, I'll stop now before I insult someone :-)

Hally
SolRo



-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 11:17 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)

we get the same thing on our server, as i am sure every
"uber-guild" (stupid
term) does on their respective servers. i don't think
anyone is quite as
large or has quite the attitude that FoH apparently does
though. i think
they have 300 or so members, so they can really take over a
large portion of
the high level game from other players. we have about 65
members or so, and
we can do dragons and planes at our leisure as well, but we
work very well
with the other guilds on the server capable of doing these.
i don't believe
that is the case with FoH. i have no first-hand experience
but from what i
hear they deserve their rep, but i guess only those who have
dealt with them
personally can know.

ok bragging time, we killed Venril Sathir first =b

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> You can't believe how much FOH bashing there is on the
Veeshan message
> boards. I just think its funny that people get so upset
when
> a group of
> people want to play a game differently they do. I believe
a lot of it
> is jealousy, which is very sad.
